title: Still have not received the new pulsefire ezreal icon.
body: Its now the 30th and I have not received the pulsefire ezreal icon although I own pulsefire ezreal and have for a while, I just want someone to look into it. thank you.

replies.body: I found another form, I see that riot is extending the timeframe at which they are delivering the icon. thanks riot.

Yeah, we need just a bit more time to make sure everyone gets their icons.  Our aim is another 2 days, and we should be done.  In the meantime, I looked at your account just to make sure you're eligible, and added it anyway.  Hang tight!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=5zmeqAq1,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-05-30T22:32:08.482+0000)
>
> Yeah, we need just a bit more time to make sure everyone gets their icons.  Our aim is another 2 days, and we should be done.  In the meantime, I looked at your account just to make sure you're eligible, and added it anyway.  Hang tight!

I too was also wondering when I would get the icon, I have been waiting a while now, still have not gotten it :(

Hello, I have not received the icon either and its the 7th now :l pls halp... ive owned the skin for over a year now..
TNX :)
Still no icon for me too ><
